Package org.brickred.socialauth

Interface Summary
AuthProvider This is the main interface representing an authentication provider.
 

Class Summary
AbstractProvider It implements AuthProvider interface and provides some methods for registering and getting plugins.
Album Contains the Album info
AuthProviderFactory This is a factory which creates an instance of the requested provider based on the string passed as id.
Career Data bean for career info
Contact Data bean for contact information.
Education Provides education detail
Feed Data bean for Feed info
Permission  
Photo Data bean for photo info
Position Data bean for position information.
Profile Data bean for profile information.
Recommendation Data bean for recommendation info
SocialAuthConfig This class is used to load the configuration for all providers.
SocialAuthManager This class manages the Map of all the connected providers by using this manager.
